name: NOTES_TRANS_AUTH
description: This table contains transcription authorization info.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: AUTH_DTTM
columns.description: Date and time the transcription was authenticated

columns.name: AUTH_USER_ID
columns.description: Id of the user who authenticated the transcription

columns.name: AUTH_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: DICTATION_TIME
columns.description: This is the dictation date and time in datetime format.  Please note that this only contains information for authorized transcriptions.

columns.name: TRANSCRIPTION_TIME
columns.description: This is the transcription date and time in datetime format.  Please note that this only contains information for authorized transcriptions.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_DTTM
columns.description: This is the activity date and time in datetime format.

columns.name: ORIGINATOR_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the transcription edit date and time in datetime format.

columns.name: CHR_CNT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time in which the transcription character count was recorded.

columns.name: CHR_CNT_MET
columns.description: The character count of the transcription.

columns.name: DICT_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The dictation priority category number for the transcription.
